about_the_game:
Garden and a Goat places you out in the multiverse where you are needed most. Your robot-self is introduced to one of a series of ecosystems in peril. Study the surroundings, clean up the environment, and revive the soil and plants to start enticing the local wildlife to return.

Garden and a Goat is a single player casual, animal collecting and gardening game. In each ecosystem you encounter you'll spend time cleaning up the garden, planting various ecosystem specific plants, and attracting animals to the revived ecosystem. As animals visit, you'll interact with them in various ways (petting them, offering treats you make, placing decorations they enjoy) to unlock them as garden residents.

You'll use your tech consoles and drones to help the garden recover. You'll scan and harvest ecobit data currency to fuel the placement of more resident plants, animals, and decorations to accelerate the progress. Once the animals begin to take up residence again, you'll also be able to seek out secret challenges that may transform or attract exciting multiverse variant animals too!

Along your journey, you unlock a few crops to plant and harvest, a few recipes for new treats to make at the treat console, and new decorations to both beautify your garden and further entice more animals to stay. You'll also unlock and be rewarded with cosmetic items to transform your robot, consoles, and more.

Oh… and there's a goat!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-8350 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R9 270 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Solid state storage is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5-7300 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300U or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580 / Intel Arc A580 or equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Solid state storage is recommended

short_description: Garden and a Goat is a single player, casual, animal collecting and gardening game. Your robot is introduced to a series of ecosystems in need. You'll clean up the environment, revive the plants, and entice the local wildlife to return, unlocking ever more animals and decorations along the way!
